tool_description: This API provides instant access to the latest data for all operations and players in the NHL. It features scores, odds, bookmakers' stats, standings, and historical data.
name: NHL API
title: NHL API

api_list.name: Get Play By Play
api_list.description: This endpoint gets the NHL game play-by-play data for a specified game

api_list.name: NHL Score board
api_list.description: This API endpoint will get the NHL scoreboard data for a specified date if available.

api_list.name: NHL Standings
api_list.description:
This API endpoint will return the standings for the NHL.

Parameters:
->year
-> group  //acceptable group names: 'league', 'conference', 'division'. if not described, default: 'league'

optional_parameters.name: group
optional_parameters.description: acceptable group names: 'league', 'conference', 'division'. if not described, default: 'league'

api_list.name: NHL Team List
api_list.description: This API endpoint will return the list of all NHL teams

api_list.name: NHL Team Info
api_list.description: This API endpoint will return the team info for a specific NHL team.

api_list.name: NHL Summary
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the game summary data for a specified game.

api_list.name: NHL News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nhl-api5.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nhl-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://nhl-api5.p.rapidapi.com/news"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: NHL Team Statistic
NHL Team Schedule
NHL Player Statistic
NHL Team Players
api_list.description: This API endpoint will return the team roster information for a specific NHL team.

api_list.name: NHL Schedules
api_list.description: This endpoint will get NHL schedule data for a specified date when available.

api_list.name: NHL Picks
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can get the NHL PickCenter data for a specified game

api_list.name: NHL Box Score
api_list.description: From the NHL, this endpoint retrieves game box score data for a specific game.
